text: San Pablo Province is a province of the Cajamarca Region in Peru. The capital of the province is the city of San Pablo. == Political division == The province measures and is divided into four districts: {| class="wikitable" |- ! District ! Mayor |- | San Bernardino | Juan Telmo Tongombol Quispe |- | San Luis | Manuel Fortunato Moncada Cruzado |- | San Pablo | Moises Melquiades Gutierrez Cabanillas |- | Tumbadén | Silverio Tejada |} == References == Category:Provinces of the Cajamarca Region
title: San Pablo Province
